title: DDFP 252: NFL schedule 360
itunes:title: DDFP 252: NFL schedule 360
description:
Dave, Rank and Hank break down the 2014 NFL schedule from all angles including Week 1's best matchup, teams poised for a hot or cold start and the best primetime games. The guys also debate if the Seahawks will have a better record than the Broncos and make very early playoff predictions. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
